content.raw: This is a seriously fundamental change to how the task works, especially considering that we are 2/3 of the way through the competition time. It seems to me that this makes the task significantly easier, and thus the best solutions will be much more homogeneous. It also invalidates much of the work that many teams (including ours) have been doing for weeks. Is this change something you're still testing? Any chance you'll consider rolling it back before your next software release?
